Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/75th
ShortDescription: #3 King Drive buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via King Drive, 75th, Cottage Grove, 76th and King Drive, due to street blockage near King Drive/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via King Drive, 75th, Cottage Grove, 76th, then resume their normal route on King Drive, due to street blockage near King Drive/75th.

Allow extra travel time.
